short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows notifications and schedule of stayhome.ai program employees

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is used as an alternative to stayhome.ai mobile application. Provides basic functionality for:
- employee work schedule
- time attendance
